title: SIGABRT in only mirb
vulnerability_information:
PoC
-------------------

The following code triggers the bug (attached as test.rb):

	def to_str
	``
	00end
	0.times

Debug - mirb
-------------------

	The program being debugged has been started already.
	Start it from the beginning? (y or n) y
	Starting program: /home/x/Desktop/test/mruby/bin/mirb test.rb
	mirb - Embeddable Interactive Ruby Shell

	*** Error in `/home/x/Desktop/test/mruby/bin/mirb': realloc(): invalid next size: 0x0000000000710bb0 ***

	Program received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!
Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the crash, and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3506

Thanks again for your report. This issue was addressed upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/b2916f1b5cbebc2e7c10a757a36b6c6c4d36e583

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.
Thanks for helping improve the security of Shopify!
